title: Problem with server change
body:
I will get straight to the point and will try my best to explain it... 

I have two accounts; one on NA and the other on EUW. Whenever I change my server, I have the download 'new updates' everytime. Like every single day I have to download some freaking updates which doesn't even make any sense. Patching, I understand, but why do I have to download updates every single day when I change my server? And they come in GB size...
